summary: Implements a generic, configurable two‑local quantum circuit class that assembles alternating layers of single‑qubit rotations and multi‑qubit entangling operations. Users can select rotation and entangling gate types, define connectivity or custom entangler maps, set the number of repetitions, include barriers, and rely on automatic parameter generation and naming.
business_intent: Provide a versatile, hardware‑efficient ansatz construction tool for variational quantum algorithms, enabling rapid prototyping of customizable quantum circuits within the Qiskit framework.
